hymn.title: Never forget! That it's God who created you

layout.singingstanza: Nev -- er for -- get! That it's God who cre -- at -- ed you, Nev -- er for -- get He's a won -- der -- ful God. Nev -- er for -- get! That it's God who cre -- at -- ed you, Won -- der -- ful, won -- der -- ful Cre -- a -- tor God. You have... Arms that bend, knees that bend and a back that bends right o -- ver, Toes that wig -- gle and hands that tick -- le, and a mouth that gig -- gles— 'hee hee hee.'

lyrics.stanza: Never forget! That it's God who created you, Never forget He's a wonderful God. Never forget! That it's God who created you, Wonderful, wonderful Creator God. You have...
Arms that bend, knees that bend and a back that bends right over, Toes that wiggle and hands that tickle, and a mouth that giggles—'hee hee hee.'
